A note for our tenants | Emergency repair contacts

The types of urgent repairs are:

  • a burst water service
  • a serious roof leak
  • a gas leak
  • a dangerous electrical fault
  • flooding or serious flood damage
  • serious storm or fire damage
  • any fault or damage that causes the premises to be unsafe or not secure

While we will have skeleton staff working over this period, however if there is an emergency, please refer to the list below. In accordance with your Residential Tenancy Agreement the following tradespeople may be contacted only for urgent/emergency repairs as detailed above.
